title: Yelp Clone Web Application
description: Developed a Yelp clone web application using Django and Python for backend functionality, integrating Yelp Fusion API and Google Places API.

title: Facial Recognition System with TCP/IP Communication in Linux
location: Project done within the course ELE4205 - Operating systems and hardware interfaces
description: Developed a real-time facial recognition system in C++, using an Odroid-C2 to train a face detection model which then displays the names of identified individuals.

title: Portfolio website
description: Porfolio website build with ReactJS and Vite.

title: Battery Management System Controlled by an Embedded System
location: Senior year project in collaboration with Rheolution Inc.
description: Development  of a power supply module and charging management system for a Lithium-ion battery controlled by an embedded system. I worked on the electrical circuits designs as well as the MATLAB/SIMULINK simulations of the state of charge.

title: Google Chrome's Dinosaur Game on an Embedded System
location: Project done within the course ELE3312 - Microcontrollers and appplications
description: Chrome Dinosaur game running on a STM32 microcontroller that plays through ultrasonic sensors and also includes a multiplayer mode.

title: Touchless Automatic Sensor Garbage Bin with Telecommunications Features
description: Garbage bin with automatic opening through voice or hand detection that measures the amount of waste inside it and sends an SMS whenever it's full.
